Actions.Name: Lightning Spear
Actions.Charge: Deal 2 piercing damage again to target and to all foes in range 3 of the target.

Actions.Name: Reliquary
Actions.Description: The [name] marks a foe in range. While marked, all damage against the foe gains pierce, and that foe takes 1 piercing damage again after being hit or missed by any attack.

Actions.Name: Expurgation
Actions.Description: The [name] ends their turn, chooses a large blast area in range 6, and gains
Actions.Delay: Their next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, that area erupts with lightning.
Actions.PostAreaEffect: Characters inside must save or take piercing [fray] damage, once, for every character in the area, or just once on a successful save.
